Posts.Content: Hi!! Yours histories and words, give me hopes and happiness, my wife was diagnosed in octuber 2015, MBC ER+ HER2-, she has had several treatment lines, tamoxifen, taxol, Palbociclib + letrozole, fulvestrant + everolimus, according her disease progression, today is on taxotere + ciclophosphamide because some weeks ago was detected great and fast bones progression and again some liver mets, so, we would wish not to be in this situation, but meanwhile there are treatments and hopes, we will fight and enjoy the life. By the way, we live in Chile and maybe the information and treatment is a little delay. Bye and all my best wishes for you. Juli√°n
Posts.Title: Calling 5 plus years NED with mets
